name: help
general: Command that shows all the available commands in the CLI
specific:
help [command]

This command shows all the available commands in the CLI. If a command is specified, it will show specific information about that command.

name: exit
specific:
exit

This command closes the CLI.

name: clear
specific:
clear

This command clears the CLI.

name: version
specific:
version

This command shows the CLI version.

name: config
specific:
config [options]

This command configures the CLI. If no options are specified, it will show the current configuration. If options are specified, it will change the configuration.

name: process
general: Get a set of files from the user filesystem and send them to the core
specific:
process [options]

This command gets a set of files selected by the user and sends them to the core to be processed for plagiarism.
